name: Panacea
description: If you rule Time III, gain $4. If you rule Time II, draw a card. If you rule Time I, advance one of your ♛.

name: Golden Apple
description: Each other player moves here (they don't visit this Zone, they just move).

name: Pilgrims
description: Score a card paying $12 less, advancing 2 ♛ less.

name: Visionary
description: Advance one of your ♛. Play another card.
score-instruction: When you score this, you may score another card.

name: Meet Younger Self
score-instruction: When you score this, draw a card.
